overview: Zaman has to accept and be willing to change his life after his only child, Iman is 9 years old and has reached the phase of hearing loss. Not only that treatment and surgery need to be done, but also Iman has to be transferred to a special school. Everything needs money and Zaman do not earn enough to accommodate all. There is an easy way when Zaman's brother, Abang Long Zamri wants to sell the field, which is the land inherited by his late father . But Zaman was the one who opposed and do not want to sell the land even though it was a quick and easy way to solve all his problems. There is his wife's grave on the field. Iman always communicate with her and once he could not speak, he wrote a letter to his mother and would lay it on the grave.
title: Padang Kertas
